page.title: 15Orchards Caravan Park
page.content: Mr. Peplow is the proprietor of the {Orchards Caravan Park and Camp site}at Newbridge. This covers 15 acres and was opened 27 years ago. There are 60 static caravans with piped water, electricity, bottled gas, flush toilets and colour TV. The caravans are made of aluminium and wood and are well spaced out on grass among trees.Visitors pay from Â£80 to Â£240 per week to hire one of the caravans. There are 175 spaces for{touring {caravans}and{tents.}The charges are Â£4 to Â£7 for a family for a week. The amenities on the site include a heated outdoor{swimming pool-}20 metres long.There is a small paddling pool. The water is continuously filtered and chlorinated.There is a television room, a launderette and a small games room.
